name: origam
description:
A puzzle game that can satisfy even the perfectionists.
You just need to fill all triangles with color!

This may look easy at first, but you can’t just tap randomly at any triangle.

Since you can only color the triangle right next to the present one, think carefully which direction should you move & how should you spread out the color.

If you end up with a wrong strategy, your puzzle will not be finished.

A lot of levels with up to 4000 stages are waiting for you to clear!
